title: Digital Decoy
description: A crafty con where phony emails lure you into a false sense of security.
details: Cunning cyber bandits craft messages mimicking trusted brands, tricking you into divulging passwords, credit card data, or other prized details. Think twice before clicking any link that feels out of place—even if it looks perfectly polished.

title: Phantom Tech Rescue
description: A sham helpline that pretends to save your computer, but only cleans out your wallet.
details: These imposters masquerade as tech saviors, offering help for non-existent glitches to gain remote control of your device. Their goal is to install malware or pilfer your sensitive files. Always verify with an official support channel rather than rushing into any unsolicited 'rescue' call.

title: Fortune Mirage
description: An enticing fake win that vanishes as soon as you reach for it.
details: Out of the blue, you get notified about a nonexistent lottery windfall that demands a fee upfront to release your payout. In reality, no reputable lottery ever asks you to invest money to secure a prize you've supposedly earned.

title: Heartstrings Heist
description: A deceiver weaving a web of fabricated romance to lure you into financial loss.
details: An impostor constructs an alluring online persona on dating sites or social media, sparking what seems to be a genuine connection. But behind the charm is a calculated ploy—eventually, they conjure up an emergency that requires a monetary bailout. Exercise extreme caution when requests for money arise from unfamiliar faces.
